name: Greenstart
tag_list: cleantech, accelerator, incubator, it, information-technology-cleanweb, startups, design, software, clean-energy, efficiency, electric-vehicles, green, sustainability
overview:
Greenstart is a design studio and startup accelerator focused on digital cleantech (using software to reduce dirty energy or expand clean energy).

Greenstart invests seed capital in digital cleantech startups and helps them achieve progress during a 3-month Startup Designâ„¢ program focused on Customer Development, UX, Brand and Fundraising. Companies selected to join a cohort receive seed capital, office space in San Francisco, mentoring, and the opportunity to network with cleantech investors. Each session culminates with an investor pitch day. Session length is three months and takes place three times a year.

milestones.description: In addition to the $15,000 in seed funding that Greenstart provides, startups now also have the opportunity to receive a $100,000 convertible note.
milestones.source_description: Cleantech-Focused Incubator Greenstart Now Offering Startups An Extra $100K
